description: 福岡発のコラボレーションツール企業。プロジェクト管理「Backlog」は有料ユーザー128万人超で「ITreview Grid Award 2024 Fall」最高位LEADER獲得。オンライン作図「Cacoo」や組織セキュリティ「Nulab Pass」も提供。フルリモート体制で約5割が福岡在住。Scalaコミュニティへの貢献やエンジニアフレンドリーシティ福岡への協賛など技術コミュニティ活動も活発。
description_en: Collaboration tools company from Fukuoka. Project management tool "Backlog" has over 1.28 million paid users and earned highest LEADER position in "ITreview Grid Award 2024 Fall." Also provides online diagramming "Cacoo" and organization security "Nulab Pass." Full remote structure with about 50% residing in Fukuoka. Active in tech community including Scala community contributions and sponsoring Engineer Friendly City Fukuoka.
